title: 이달의소녀탐구 #501 (LOONA TV #501)
members: Kim Lip, HaSeul, HeeJin, Go Won, Yves, Chuu
summary:
0:01 -- Kim Lip attacks everyone with her hands in the shape of a butterfly. HaSeul mentions that they choereographed their dance moves. HeeJIn imitates YeoJin.
0:23 -- HaSeul imitates Choerry. Go Won mimicks Yves and vice-versa. They then imitate Chuu and Olivia Hye.
0:47 -- Chuu imitates the rest of yyxy.
